00017 #define APOXI_VCARD_NAME_COUNT 5
00018 // order specified by vCard standard
00019 #define APOXI_VCARD_NAME_FAMILY     0
00020 #define APOXI_VCARD_NAME_GIVEN      1
00021 #define APOXI_VCARD_NAME_ADD        2
00022 #define APOXI_VCARD_NAME_PREFIX     3
00023 #define APOXI_VCARD_NAME_SUFFIX     4

00042 // telephone type flags

00044 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_WORK   0x0002
00045 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_HOME   0x0004
00046 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_VOICE  0x0008
00047 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_FAX    0x0010
00048 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_MSG    0x0020
00049 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_CELL   0x0040
00050 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_PAGER  0x0080
00051 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_BBS    0x0010
00052 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_MODEM  0x0020
00053 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_CAR    0x0040
00054 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_ISDN   0x0080
00055 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_VIDEO  0x0100
00056 
00058 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_DEFAULT (APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_TEL_VOICE)
00059

00063 #define APOXI_VCARD_TYPE_ADR_POSTAL 0x0004

00067
